body:
Hi there. 

I'm trevinwoodstock, however you can call me Trev, Trevin, Trevor, or trevinwoodstock ;) I've heard about Avicus and jumped on a couple of times before, I thought it'd be an okay time to make an AMA. I can't say I'll be on all the time, just thought I'd make a thread and introduce myself, lol.  

Nice to meet you.

replies.body: Welcome! Hope you enjoy yourself here! :D
replies.body_tagged: Welcome! Hope you enjoy yourself here! :D

replies.body:
Hey! (:
Here are my favorite questions :3

1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?

replies.body:
Hey, just a question
You are confronted by a wild dog on the street. It bares it's teeth angrily. You have 3 options. Run, fight, or feed.
Which one would you choose?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey, just a question
You are confronted by a wild dog on the street. It bares it's teeth angrily. You have 3 options. Run, fight, or feed.
Which one would you choose?

replies.body:
Thanks for such a warm welcome, everyone! I'd reply to each of you individually (yeah i see that reply button there lol) but that might get kinda spammy.. Soo I'll respond to everyone in one post.  I see that the friend feature is removed for now, but when it comes back I'll send a friend request to everyone who said something here for being so nice :)

@MustardMan227, Princezz_Dubstep, Mooch24, djbuilders, CrafterPete1013 - Hi everyone and thanks! 
@auxdempster - :( icri evrytim 

@netox_max  - Thanks! Adventure. I don't really play FPS or Sports..

@goldenwalrus909 - Hai! you had some really tough questions lol
1. My favorite color is White. I guess because imo it's really clean and used in a lot of places.
2. Hmm... that's a tough one. Maybe the benefit of being more helpful. I feel bad when I can't help out, sometimes.
3. Eh.. this is kinda complicated. But maybe to just live.. if that makes sense.. Idk my reasoning is kinda.. difficult to explain.
4. Yes.
5. No. Maybe a good 7k though.
6. I would be a doughnut and because.... they're tasty I guess lol

@evilchrizillah  - Thanks! Usually getting up and taking a shower.


@HeroBrine683752  o/ Feed. I'd run out of breath if I ran, and I might not win if I fight. Feeding, could give me an advantage to run, maybe.
